attributes.action: bring a sense of perspective to the Russell Brand/Johnathan Ross controversy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The country is facing the worst economic outlook for decades, the prospect of recession followed by people losing their jobs and homes.  Instead the news agenda is focussing primarily on two comedians/entertainers, and a series of prank calls. We believe that the media in the UK should be doing their job by covering real stories and topics.  And also that Russell Brand should have his old job back.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
